title: A Crash Course on the 2020 Wide Receiver Draft Class | The Dantasy Football Podcast
description:
Danny Kelly has been grinding tape on the 2020 NFL draft so you don’t have to, and on this episode he feeds Danny Heifetz and Craig Horlbeck digestible nuggets on the deepest receiver class in years. DK compares receivers to archetypes from the standout 2014 class of Sammy Watkins, Mike Evans, Odell Beckham Jr., and Davante Adams; guesses which receiver might not pan out as a pro; and determines which receiver from 2020 could become the most exciting player in the league.
Hosts: Danny Heifetz, Danny Kelly, and Craig Horlbeck

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
